message.content:
cs.CR, cs.SI, cs.CY, cs.DS, cs.SE

This paper deals with the security and synchronization of passwords, which falls under the category of computer security (cs.CR). The paper also discusses the use of a server to store salt values, which could be considered under the sub-category of systems and information security (cs.SI). Additionally, the paper presents a mechanism for automatically retrieving and processing password requirements, which could be classified under the sub-category of cybersecurity (cs.CY). The use of a shared secret and random salt values also involves concepts from cryptography and data structures, which could be categorized under the sub-categories of data structures and algorithms (cs.DS) and software engineering (cs.SE).
